Reviews.Title: “business trip”
Reviews.Author: vickyak
Reviews.Content: stayed overnight business trip literally 9pm 8am perfect purposes yes clean staff friendly bathroom bit dated nice hot shower value money minute deal recommend purpose staying length time

Reviews.Title: “Avoid if at all possible...”
Reviews.Author: Paul B
Reviews.Content: booked hotel company event arrival paid told actually staying hotels directly road hotel dire touched decorated 70s mould bathrooms reception doorbell threadbare carpets musty smell corridors etc etc hotel booking using images reviews hotel send appalling condition avoid booking hotel costs yourself staying hadnt expected

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...”
Reviews.Author: Jules8377
Reviews.Content: partner stayed 2 nights june close hyde park gig parking £10 day london staff lovely basically slept size you’re looking cheap crash recommend springfield luxury pay price

Reviews.Title: “satisfactory accomodation for the price”
Reviews.Author: F1F1
Reviews.Content: welcome quad bed collapsed time sat reverted sleeping mattress clean bedding fine clean towels day breakfast day accomodation met sleep affordable price

Reviews.Title: “Good location on fair price”
Reviews.Author: BiserDimitrov
Reviews.Content: hotel convenient located close metro stations neighborhood nice bathrooms checkout time 10am close windows sleep busy street outside conclusion hotel served purpose location fair price

Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel but well located”
Reviews.Author: Rockyroad2dublin
Reviews.Content: using springfield thirty recently previous owners stay wehn am london business own prefer significant slightly upmarket springfield sleep thats easy heathrow 15 mins heathrow express clean comfortable breakfast usual english breakfast wont hungry generous portions lay head night close west airport worse springfield dont expect spacious widescreen tv wont disapponted basic bb hotel

Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: ashersk
Reviews.Content: hotel location lot desired hotel lift carry bags flights stairs breakfast fine staff friendly desperate refurbishment stains ceiling window wouldnt paint feeling ceiling bathroom light didnt stayed nights price cant expect
